data.text: Mba enser mbɨ bakɨ mben na khɨvigi. Mba mbɨ zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndi ndɨɨi. Ana guigira ŋgara garav, gras fara muuŋgi. Mba mbɨ, ana Fhe Bakɨme gum ana Sipsiva Ŋguk, ana manin ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan pigi mpirmpirɨgar piin kegap hi.

22.2: Stt 2.9; Ese 47.12; Jol 3.18; Sek 14.8; VB 2.7; 21.24; 22.14; 22.19Ana zerav, khuafuav vov, mba ŋgu bakɨmen tuav, ana rɨgɨra ana sharav veri. Mba mbɨ gaar mueŋ ndereŋ, gu khueŋ nderen mba zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndi ndɨɨi khira ki. Mba khira mpari tugɨra tɨgap, mbe 12 thɨgi kɨni tugɨra tɨgap vhɨgi mbai. Mba khirar fari, kha nuianan ki gumgi nta farir wari wo rɨmrɨɨ gum nzuua mbuim, nta vhɨzi.
22.3: Stt 3.17; Ese 48.35; Sek 14.11; VB 7.15Fhe Bakɨme mba ana buni daasui gumgi gu tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana nta thɨvigi, nta mba ŋgu bakɨmen kegɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
22.4: Sng 42.2; Mt 5.8; 1 Ko 13.12; 1 Zo 3.2; VB 3.12; 14.1Mbe ana rotur muuŋv ana khoma ganɨnga. Ana wo zɨn mbe ŋivkɨrir kherɨrga.

22.5: Ais 60.19; Dan 7.18; 7.27; 2 T 2.12; VB 5.10; 20.6; 21.23-25Maaŋ wom gɨnɨnga fhuvara. Raa gum ran ŋaar wom ŋaar ki fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Guma Bakɨme, ana Fhe Bakɨme ma, ana nduara vhava ŋaarar gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨnga. Mbe ŋgui vhɨrve gari gumgir pani kɨv, mbe zazera mbara muuŋgip kɨrga.

Mba enser khaŋ na nzuai, “Kha bunai, nai guigi guarara. Kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi, za ne khothɨgɨrga, ne nzerara. Fhe Bakɨme, ana Guma Bakɨme ma. Ana nduara won Ŋina Ŋaar ana won kamthooŋ gumgir ga ndɨɨv, ana won enser ga sarigim, ana zɨv, za mba vhemkora hɨgɨrga bigi ana ŋaari gumgi khɨvɨrga.”
Gu Zon, gu mba buni mbararav, gu mba bigi gangi. Gu mba buni mbararav, mba bigi gangiap, gu mbara wo thɨpanani phɨrgiap, mba bigir na khɨvigi enser ŋkarveni nɨman fav, ana rotur muun za mbui.

Ana mbara khaŋ na nzuai, “Ndu maaŋ muuŋ thari! Gu ndu phorgap vhɨra harigi Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumgi, gu nde phorga ŋgari ŋaara guma mbe ma. Gu vhɨra kha gavar ki buni zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi phorga ŋgari ŋaara guma mbe ma. Ndu Fhe Bakɨmera rotur muuŋri.”

22.10: Dan 8.26; 12.4; 12.9; VB 1.3; 10.4Ana maaŋ na nzuav, wom khaŋ nzuai, “Kha Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ guma suaŋgi buneŋ kha gavar ki, ndu ne vhaa thari. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ne khaŋ muuŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme mba bigir muunga tuk za han mbarigi.

22.11: Ese 3.27; Dan 12.10; 2 T 3.13Mba tugar, mba gumgi gu mbigir farfagi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi, mbe mbar mba tɨvir mbatɨgir muuŋ. Mba mberi tɨvi guarira mbui gumgi gu mbigi, mbe mbar mba tɨvir mbatɨgir muuŋ. Mba tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi, mbe mba tɨvir vhuuin muuŋv kɨri. Mba Fhe Bakɨme wora mbuigi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe vhɨra ŋgaravra kɨri.”
Zisas khaŋ nzuai, “Mbarara! Gu vhemkora nden han zirɨrga. Gu vhezar za kha gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨnga. Gu vhezar za mba gumgi gu mbigi bevbevira mbe muuŋgi tɨv ga suaŋv mben nɨɨnga.
22.13: Ais 44.6; 48.12; VB 1.8; 1.17; 2.8; 21.6Gu nduara, gu Guigira Fharav Ki, gu vhɨra Guigira Zɨn Ki. Gu Za Kha Bigir Nɨɨŋge ma. Gu wo muuŋgi ŋaari, gu nduara nta vhɨzgi.

“Mba za wari won shagi ruagi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe ndikndigɨri. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgip, mbe mba zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndi ndɨɨi khan vhɨgar mbegɨrga. Mbe vhɨra mba ŋgu bakɨmen thɨmkamanin vhen ŋgirgɨrga.

22.15: Ga 5.19-21; Fi 3.2; Kor 3.6; VB 21.8Mba feiŋ mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi, mba kugi ga mbui gumgi gum, mba mbarkɨrga tori ga mbuav, ruarir gumgi gu mbigi wari kɨɨv, wari ndi gumgi gu mbigi gum, gumgi gu mbigi shogim, mbe vhɨzi gumgi gum, mba mbarɨvi gu tori rotu mbui gumgi gu bigi, guiguigi gumgi mba guiguigi tɨvi zɨn vui gumgi, mbe Fhe Bakɨmen ŋgu bakɨme vhen ŋgirgɨrga tuktɨgi fhu. Mbe anan ŋgun kɨrar kegɨrga.

22.16: Nam 24.17; Ais 11.1; 11.10; Sek 6.12; Ro 1.3; 2 Pi 1.19; VB 2.28; 5.5Gu Zisas, gu won enser ga sarigim, ana nden han zi. Ana zav nde siosan vhen ki gumgi gu mbigi, ana nde nzuai. Gu nduara mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan Devitan nzɨgir shɨgar hɨgi nzɨk ma. Gu mba Mɨn Gorɨr Zav Mbuim Manera Ndai Kama Ŋaara Bakɨme” ma.

Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar gum Sipsivar Ŋgugar Muuŋ, mani khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu zɨ!” Mba buni mbararagi gumgi, mbe vhɨra khaŋ suaŋ, “Ndu zɨ!” Maaŋgi guma, ana fhɨr khigi, ana zɨ. Guma fhɨr khigip, mbɨr mbɨr saŋv ana zɨv, ana zazera mbarara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndi ndɨɨi mbɨ, ana anan mbɨri. Fhe Bakɨme fhura ana ndi ndɨɨi.

Fhe Bakɨme zumgum hɨrga bigi bun nzuaim, nta kha gavar kim, nde nta mbararagi gumgi gu mbigi, gu kama havharar nde nzuai. Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the harigi kama thuen Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma kha gavar suaŋgi buneŋ ga phevarga, Fhe Bakɨme kha gavar mba hɨr za suaŋgi bigi mbatɨgi, Fhe Bakɨme mba bigi mbatɨgir mba guman hɨrga bigir mbatɨgi ga phevarga.

22.19: Sng 69.28; VB 13.8; 22.2Guma the maaŋ muuŋgip kha gavar Fhe Bakɨme zumgum hɨrga bigi bun nzuai buni thari, ana nta vharav nta thugɨrga, Fhe Bakɨme vhɨra mba guma zɨ thugɨp ana vhararga. Ana vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen ŋgu kha gap ana bun nzuai, ana mba ŋgu bakɨmen kegɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
Mba guma ana za mba bigi bun nzuav, ana khaŋ nzuai,
Guma Bakɨme Zisas, ana fhura kora mbui korar muumbar Fhe Bakɨme za kha gumgi gu mbigi phorgɨ kɨri.
